com.gensym.util
Interface DefinitionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventMulticaster
public interface DefinitionListener
extends EventListener

The listener interface for receiving class change events from G2 Definitions.

Method Summary
 void classInheritancePathChanged(DefinitionEvent e)
          Invoked when the inheritance-path of the class being defined by the class-definition changes
 void classNameChanged(DefinitionEvent e)
          Invoked when the class-name in the definition changes.
 void classSpecificAttributesChanged(DefinitionEvent e)
           
 void deleted(DefinitionEvent e)
          Invoked when the definition is deleted.
 void directSuperiorClassesChanged(DefinitionEvent e)
          Invoked when the direct-superior-classes in the definition changes.
 void staticAttributeChanged(DefinitionEvent e)
          Invoked when an attribute of the definition changes.
